item.title: U.S. hits ISIS in Syria with large retaliatory strikes, officials say
item.description: President Donald Trump had vowed to retaliate after a suspected ISIS attack killed U.S. personnel last weekend in Syria.

item.title: Epstein files released by DOJ
item.description: President Donald Trump signed the Epstein Files Transparency Act in November.

item.title: Trump's name added to Kennedy Center building a day after board votes to rename DC theater
item.description: President Kennedy's niece, Maria Shriver, said it is "beyond comprehension that this sitting president has sought to rename this great memorial."

item.title: Brown and MIT prof shooter suspect Neves Valente is found dead, authorities say
item.description: The suspected killer, Claudio Manuel Neves Valente, 48, was a graduate students in physics at Brown University in the early 2000s.

item.title: Putin ally Viktor Orb√°n tells CNBC using frozen Russian assets is a 'dead end'
item.description: European officials are trying to convince a handful of EU member countries to back controversial plans for providing more financial support to Ukraine...
